name: Polkaquery
description: A natural language search engine for the Polkadot ecosystem. Can answer questions about on-chain data (balances, assets, NFTs, transactions) and general Polkadot concepts.
author: Polkaquery Team

endpoints.name: query
endpoints.description: Submit a natural language query about the Polkadot ecosystem.

query.description: The natural language question to ask.

network.description: Optional. The specific network to target (e.g., "polkadot", "kusama"). Defaults to polkadot.

answer.description: The natural language answer to the query.
